long_description: A simple, durable and dependable trailer without the premium price tag, the Burley Bee Bike Trailer offers seating for 1 or 2 children and 100 lbs. of carrying capacity. Includes an easy-to-use bike tow bar, which enables you to pull the Burley Bee by bike; hitch positioning is designed for superior trailer tracking. Rear tailgate offers easy access to rear cargo, and a 2-in-1 non-zip cover offers protection from the weather and easy viewing. Comfy suspended seat is built with breathable flow-through mesh and a helmet pocket; 5-point harness system with padded shoulder straps keeps children comfortable and secure. 20 in. alloy wheels with wheel guards roll easily and can be removed with a simple push of a button. Reflectors, reflective trim and safety flag provide low-light visibility; tinted windows have UV protection. Folds quickly and compactly for easy storage; folded dimensions are 37 x 25 x 11 in. The Burley Bee Bike Trailer includes bike tow bar and hitch, cover, safety flag and manual.
